trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.CancelCommand"></xref>, <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.DeleteCommand"></xref>, <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.EditCommand"></xref>, <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.ItemCommand"></xref>, and <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.UpdateCommand"></xref> events of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Provides data for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.CancelCommand"></xref>, <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.DeleteCommand"></xref>, <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.EditCommand"></xref>, <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.ItemCommand"></xref>, and <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.UpdateCommand"></xref> events of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid"></xref> control.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Questa classe non può essere ereditata.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.CancelCommand> event is raised when the Cancel button for an item in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control is clicked.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.CancelCommand>evento viene generato quando l'annullamento pulsante per un elemento di <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>si fa clic sul controllo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.CancelCommand>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.DeleteCommand> event is raised when the Delete button for an item in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control is clicked.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.DeleteCommand>evento viene generato quando l'eliminazione pulsante per un elemento di <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>si fa clic sul controllo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.DeleteCommand>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.EditCommand> event is raised when the Edit button for an item in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control is clicked.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.EditCommand>evento viene generato quando sul pulsante Modifica per un elemento di <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>si fa clic sul controllo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.EditCommand>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.ItemCommand> event is raised when any button for an item in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control is clicked.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.ItemCommand>evento viene generato quando tutti i pulsanti per un elemento di <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>si fa clic sul controllo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.ItemCommand>

trans-unit.source: This allows you to programmatically test for when a specific command button is clicked and take appropriate action.
trans-unit.target: Ciò consente di verificare quando si fa clic sul pulsante di comando specifico a livello di codice e intraprendere l'azione appropriata.

trans-unit.source: This event is commonly used to handle custom command buttons for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control.
trans-unit.target: Questo evento viene utilizzato comunemente per gestire i pulsanti di comando personalizzato per il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>controllo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.UpdateCommand> event is raised when the Update button for an item in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control is clicked.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.UpdateCommand>evento viene generato quando il pulsante Aggiorna per un elemento di <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>si fa clic sul controllo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.UpdateCommand>

trans-unit.source: For a list of initial property values for an instance of DataGridCommandEventArgs, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridCommandEventArgs.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: Per un elenco di valori di proprietà iniziali per un'istanza di DataGridCommandEventArgs, vedere il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridCommandEventArgs.%23ctor%2A>costruttore.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridCommandEventArgs.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Events and Delegates](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni sulla gestione degli eventi, vedere [NIB: eventi e delegati](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridCommandEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridCommandEventArgs"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to create and initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridCommandEventArgs> class.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare questo costruttore per creare e inizializzare una nuova istanza della <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridCommandEventArgs>classe.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridCommandEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: When an instance of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridCommandEventArgs> is created by a call to this constructor, the following properties are initialized to the specified values.
trans-unit.target: Quando un'istanza di <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridCommandEventArgs>viene creato da una chiamata a questo costruttore, le proprietà seguenti vengono inizializzate sui valori specificati.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridCommandEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: |Property|Initial value| |--------------|-------------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridCommandEventArgs.CommandSource%2A>|The value of the `commandSource` parameter.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridCommandEventArgs.Item%2A>|The value of the `item` parameter.|
trans-unit.target: | Proprietà | Il valore iniziale | |--------------|-------------------| | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridCommandEventArgs.CommandSource%2A>| Il valore di `commandSource` parametro. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridCommandEventArgs.Item%2A>| Il valore di `item` parametro. |</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridCommandEventArgs.Item%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridCommandEventArgs.CommandSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem"></xref> that represents the selected item in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem"> </xref> che rappresenta l'elemento selezionato nel <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The source of the command.
trans-unit.target: L'origine del comando.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs"> </xref> che contiene i dati dell'evento.

trans-unit.source: Gets the source of the command.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene l'origine del comando.

trans-unit.source: Use the CommandSource property to determine the command source that raised the event.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare la proprietà CommandSource per determinare l'origine del comando che ha generato l'evento.

trans-unit.source: This property is commonly used to determine which command raised the event.
trans-unit.target: Questa proprietà viene comunemente utilizzata per determinare il comando che ha generato l'evento.

trans-unit.source: The source of the command.
trans-unit.target: L'origine del comando.

trans-unit.source: Gets the item containing the command source in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene l'elemento che contiene l'origine del comando nel <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid"> </xref> controllo.

trans-unit.source: The Item property is used to access the properties of the selected item in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control.
trans-unit.target: La proprietà dell'elemento viene utilizzata per accedere alle proprietà dell'elemento selezionato nel <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>controllo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem"></xref> that represents the selected item in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem"> </xref> che rappresenta l'elemento selezionato nel <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid"> </xref> controllo.
